units.title: Earth & Space Sciences — AC9S6U02 — Sun–Earth–planet relationships

units.title: Chemical Sciences — AC9S6U04 — Reversible vs irreversible changes
units.whyThis: This activity introduces Chemical Sciences at a level that suits you.

units.title: Biological Sciences — AC9S5U01 — Adaptations for survival
units.whyThis: You’ve already learned some Biological Sciences, so this Y5 activity is the next step to extend it.

careers.title: Marine Biologist
careers.whyThis: This career is connected to the science areas you’ve been learning. You still need inquiry skills like questioning & predicting, planning & conducting. You also need a bit more on Biological Sciences. We relaxed the rules to show this career to you now.
